edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.workspace.main
Interface WorkspaceBufferListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSMGui_ForReference, WorkspaceImpl
public interface WorkspaceBufferListener

A WorkspaceBuffer listener must receive buffer content. The source of the content is coded using an int.

ryanjmccall
